Radio Station KUOM
770 ON YOUR DIAL
October £, 195>0
Mr. Graydon Ausmus, Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
Manager, WUOA (FM)
University of Alabama
Box 2002
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon:
The News Letter mailing for October will include
a new NAEB directory. However, since you have taken
the trouble to write to me for an up-to-date version,
I am mailing you one today so that you may have it to
use immediately.
I plan to be in Lexington at the end of the month
and will look forward to seeing you there.
With best personal regards.
Burton Paulu, Manager
Radio Station KUOM
Sincerely yours
